item.description:
Now that the heat wave is over and things have settled down in my personal life, let's do what CT Avon Lady suggested and have a pot luck dinner. Let's have some fun with our politics.

We can also discuss what we can do to help with the upcoming municipal elections that are so important here in Connecticut. That's where real change begins.

Because it's vacation time, we are suggesting 8/4, but the date can be changed if it conflicts with vacations.
item.how_to_find_us: Exit 45 off I-91. Go straight through light at top of hill. Dunkin Donuts is on the left, about 1/4 mile from light.
item.name: Let's get together to plan our pot luck supper.
